CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Begin Transportation stage positioned above or below the Book Transport Service stage?
SRP.A: The Begin Transportation stage is positioned {below} the Book Transport Service stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Begin Transportation?
VE.A: The value of stage Begin Transportation is {665}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete Delivery?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete Delivery is {553}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Select Carrier or Service, with a value of {2053}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Complete Delivery, with a value of {553}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Prepare for Pickup to stage Begin Transportation?
SC.A: Decreased by {470} Thousand Shipments from stage Prepare for Pickup to stage Begin Transportation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1798? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Carrier or Service} stage has {2053}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1339? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {1135}, the {Begin Transportation} stage has {665}, the {Complete Delivery} stage has {553}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 609 and 1339? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {1135}, the {Begin Transportation} stage has {665}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prepare for Pickup} to {Begin Transportation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, from stage Select Carrier or Service to Book Transport Service, or from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Carrier or Service} to stage {Book Transport Service} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Select Carrier or Service} and {Book Transport Service} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Begin Transportation} and {Complete Delivery} stages.
